amendment.description: Amendment sought to specify that the savings achieved through lock-box spending reductions shall only be used to reduce the budget deficit and shall not be used, either directly or indirectly, to increase the budget deficit of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to specifying that the savings achieved through lock-box spending reductions shall only be used to reduce the budget deficit and shall not be used, either directly or indirectly, to increase the budget deficit of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meek amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 282 (Roll no. 657).
